data.persona: I am the prince to the king. I am the rightful heir to the throne. I need to marry a young princess.
data.description:
You are in the Royal Tomb.
This is a large room in the center of the Temple with really high ceilings and there are tombs for every empress and emperor of which are decorated with jewels and treasures and precious stones.
There's a precious stone, a tomb, a flower, a tombs, a jewel, a coin, a personalized tomb, a treasures, and a carved statue here.
The worker and the the empress are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a clothes, and wielding a shield.

data.short_motivation: I need a present for the Princess
data.mid_motivation: I want to impress the Princess with the coin
data.long_motivation: I intend to propose to the Princess and need to gain her affection
